channel.title: CVE Feed for KaizenCoders -- Short URL
channel.description: The latest CVEs for KaizenCoders -- Short URL

item.title: CVE-2023-45058|2024-08-02T20:14:19.338Z -- kaizencoders -- short%20url
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in KaizenCoders Short URL plugin <=Â 1.6.8 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-1602|2024-08-02T05:57:23.330Z -- kaizencoders -- short%20url
item.description: The Short URL plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'comment' parameter due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping in versions up to, and including, 1.6.4. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with administrator-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-32138|2024-08-02T02:06:44.051Z -- kaizencoders -- short%20url
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in KaizenCoders Short URL allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Short URL: from n/a through 1.6.8.
